WebhookResponse.title: WebhookResponse
WebhookResponse.description: Represents the response received from a webhook.

id.description: Unique identifier for the webhook response.

status.description: The status of the webhook response (e.g., pending, completed, failed).

message.description: A descriptive message associated with the webhook response.

initialResponse.description: The initial response from the service that triggered the webhook.

responseBody.description: The full response body received from the webhook endpoint.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the webhook response was received.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Stores user profile information, including their role and status.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

role.description: The user's role in the system. The 'admin' role is primarily managed via custom claims.

status.description: The current status of the user's account.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

v8_username.description: Username for the V8 API integration.

v8_password.description: Password for the V8 API integration (should be stored securely).

v8_audience.description: Audience for the V8 API integration.

v8_client_id.description: Client ID for the V8 API integration.

ActivityLog.title: Activity Log
ActivityLog.description: Stores a record of user actions within the application.

userId.description: The UID of the user who performed the action.

userEmail.description: The email of the user for easy reference.

action.description: A description of the action performed (e.g., 'Consulta FGTS').

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the action occurred.

/webhookResponses/{webhookResponseId}.description: Stores webhook responses. The webhookResponseId is the unique ID for each response.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. The userId is the same as the Firebase Auth UID.

/activityLogs/{logId}.description: Stores records of user activities for auditing and dashboard metrics.
